import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { GLOBALTYPES } from '../../redux/actions/globalTypes' // Import icons import { FaCompass, FaBell } from 'react-icons/fa' import {AiFillMessage} from 'react-icons/ai' import logo from '../../images/logo.jpeg' import { logout } from '../../redux/actions/authAction' const Header = () => { const bfLoginLink = [ {label: 'Login', icon: " ", path: '/login'}, {label: 'Register', icon: "", path: '/register'} ] const afLoginLinks = [ {label: 'Browse', icon: FaCompass, path: '/'}, {label: 'Notification', icon: FaBell, path: '/notify'}, {label: 'Message', icon: AiFillMessage, path: '/message'} ] const navLinkBottom = [ {label: 'Dashboard', path: '/dashboard'}, {label: 'My Lists', path: '/lists'}, {label: 'My Projects', path: '/projects'}, {label: 'Inbox', path: '/inbox'}, {label: 'Feedback', path: '/feedback'} ] const none = [] const { auth, theme } = useSelector(state => state) const dispatch = useDispatch() const { pathName } = useLocation() const navLinks = auth.token ? afLoginLinks : bfLoginLink const isActive = (pn) => { if(pn === pathName) return 'active' } return (
